%1$s credits will be deducted as deposit for the first 5 minutes of the broadcast. The deposit will be returned to your account if: - The broadcaster does not accept your request - The broadcaster does not show up during the booking period
You will receive a rebate after watching a paid broadcast for a certain amount of time. You can use these credits to send gifts, pop-up messages and request talent shows.

1、What is Intimacy Level? \nYour Intimacy Level represents how intimate you are with a broadcaster and is independent for each broadcaster.

2、What are the privileges for different levels? 
Level 1: send private messages to broadcasters. 
Level 2: unlock broadcaster's private photos. 
Level 3: send advanced emoticons. 
Level 4: send intimacy limited virtual gifts. 
Level 5 and higher: more privileges will be available soon

3、How do I move up to the next intimacy level? \nEach gift sent goes toward moving up to the next level, and you will unlock different privileges and services. Intimacy with the broadcaster may decrease if you don\'t regularly view their One-on-One broadcasts.

With Hang-out you can enjoy fully interacting with broadcasters and their friends in the same live video Hang-out room. By clicking \"Start Hang-out\" below, you will first enter the broadcaster\'s Hang-out room. Then, through your or her invitation, friends of her invited will join the Hang-out for a great time together!\n\nHang-out is billed at %s credits per minute per broadcaster.
Click Start button below, you will first enter %s\'s Hang-out room. Then, through your or %s\'s invitation, %s\'s friends will join the Hang-out.

To make further steps, you may:
Say Hi is a quick and easy way to say Hello and let the broadcasters know you are interested.
Just select a simple greeting and a romantic theme to express how you feel.
It\'s FREE to send and read the first response!

The first response is FREE to read.
Starting from the second response, 1
post stamp or 1 credit will be
deducted from your account.
You haven\'t sent any Say Hi yet.\nWhy not find someone and Say Hi to her?
You haven\'t got any responses yet.\nWhy not find someone and Say Hi to her?
Get Stamps to contiune reading this response now!
Network unavailable at the moment.\nTap to retry.
Fail to load this page. Please try again later.
How to add a contact here?\nYou may use any of our services:
Your profile photo is under review.
Virtual Gifts is a convenient and romantic way to show your love and care to her in a high definition live video room.
Send a Virtual Gift every day and make her feel warm and special as if you\'re by her side.
There is no item in your cart!
Leave us a message here if you have any special request regarding the delivery (such as exact day delivery).

* Please review your order carefully before proceeding to checkout. Normally delivery times vary from 2 to 5 business days. You may leave a message in the box below to make an exact delivery day request.
There is no item to checkout!
There is no Gift / Flower order history within recent 60 days.
Why not give your favorite girls a surprise?

Pending:Order received and delivery to be arranged as soon as possible.

Shipped:Order has been shipped according to the instructions of your order.

Delivered:Order delivery successful.

Confirmed by express delivery service or affiliated Gifts/Flowers shop.

Cancelled:Order cancelled.
